name: Octoshphere
description:
A caravan shmup where the goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and get the highest score possible in 2 minutes. 

Z: Shoot

X: Slow

Arrow keys to move

R: Restart Game

Enemies are Invulnerable when coming onto the screen. Pointblank them to get more hyper energy. 

Your shot locks on to nearby enemies in all directions, get close to enemies to hit them easier. Non-boss enemies also don't deal contact damage.

Hypers activate automatically if you are at 100 energy and can stack up to 4 times. Hypers increase shot power, enemy difficulty and game speed.
